column4: does anyone have a basic conkyrc file I could check out? who uses gnome and NO composite manager. please
I believe there hundreds, if not thousands on ubuntu-forums.
thanks, ive been dealing with the issue for over 2 years and I've tried "thousands" of configs only to come to same issue
Doesn't sound like fun. :-(
I'm sure, after 2 yr.s you've seen this; if not, try posting your problem on the last page: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=281865&highlight=conky
im well aware of the forums. not bragging but i have almost 5,000 posts
im a busy body helper most times.
but this silly conky issue had me on my knees. LOL
i am dannyboy79 on the forums
I haven't been on too much, lately; only a couple of hundred beans..
it's all good. as i said I wasn't trying to brag about my bean count I was merely showing proof that I was aware of the forums
like I said, been using ubuntu since dapper
But, did you post your problem in the thread that I gave you? It started in Oct. '06 and is over 1,800 pages long..
no because as I stated. I never really cared enough to figure it out, much more pressing things to work on. It's all fixed now and thats good
If the guys/gals who frequent that thread can't answer, there may be 'no answer." :-(
it's working, maybe you missed that I said I solved it
Same, here.
you're not from Florida are you?
lol, i know someone with your "handle" from florida
No, I'm not but have enjoyed my visits, there.
And, you're exactly correct; it was my "handle", back in the CB days (the 70s).
